title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.201 - Operating cost (or expense)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.201 - Operating cost (or expense)

State Regulations

An expense incurred in conducting the ordinary major
activities of an enterprise, usually excluding nonoperating expense or income
deductions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.201

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
